features: 100% Natural Ingredients and Korean Organic Kombucha - Collagen cream is formulated with organically grown fermented green tea and 40.54% Kombucha extract.
Benefits of Kombucha: Contains several antioxidants, 4 times that of green tea, that are produced during the fermentation process to help protect the skin.
Kombucha and Ceramide Cream - Quickly absorbs into the skin to soothe and strengthens skin's moisture barrier and helps restore sensitive skin after cleansing.
Lightweight and Non-Greasy - great for all skin types. Kombucha smoothes out uneven tones for firmer more elastic skin, while ceramide and collagen provide deep moisturize.
Vegan and Cruelty Free Collagen Cream - 100% vegan and cruelty free collagen cream. Made without dyes, parabens, sulfates, phthalates and gluten! Happy planet, happy skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ANTI-AGING MOISTURE CREAM KOMBUCA Vegan Collagen Cream An intense moisturizer to replenish dry, distressed skin with lasting hydrationHelps to protect the skin's moisture barrier and restores moisture to visibly plump skin and improve the look of fine lines

MAIN INGREDIENTS Organic Green Tea from Bosong Raw materials harvested from Bosong, which is the largest high quality and clean organic green tea area in Korea. Fermented KOMBUCHA The solution is rich in polyphenol, probiotics, prebiotics, and minerals that enhances the skin barrier and protects it from external irritation Micro Biome Microbiome helps to strengthen the natural power of the skin so that it makes healthy and soothing skin Vegan Collagen+CERAMIDE Plant-derived collagen is similar to human body components, so it has excellent stability and is low in molecular weight and has excellent absorption

SYNBIOTICS AFTER 7 LONG DAYS What is the KOMBUCHA? KOMBUCHA is tea fermented with 'Scoby' yeast after permeating black tea and rich in glucronic acid, polyphenols and prebiotics which has excellent detoxification and antioxidant effects.

TIPS FOR KOMBUCHA SKINCARE KOMBUCHA PLANT BIOME TONER KOMBUCHA PLANT BIOME SERUM KOMBUCHA COLLAGEN CREAM Ingredients Organic Kombucha (83.47%) + Triple Hyaluronic Acid Ingredients Organic Kombucha (70.3%) + Ceramide + Hempseed oil Ingredients Organic Kombucha (40.53%) + Collagen + Adenosine Bentefits Balances dead skin cells, pH, and oil and moisture after washing your face Bentefits Strengthens skin barrier and deep moisturizing without stickyness Bentefits Strengthens skin barrier and skin elasticity without oily feeling Clean beauty Heavy metal test completed / Cruelty free Clean beauty Heavy metal test completed / Cruelty free Clean beauty Heavy metal test completed / Cruelty free

Q1. Can people with oily skin use it? A. It is a non-sticky, high-moisturizing cream that balances the oil-water balance of the skin without unnecessary oily feeling. Q2. Is it noncomedogenic moisturizer? A. It does not contain pore-clogging ingredients, and the oil content is not high, so you can use it without worrying about skin problems. Q3. Is collagen an animal-derived ingredient? A. No, it contains plant yeast-derived collagen ingredients and has a low molecular weight and has excellent skin absorption compared to animal-derived collagen ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and even skin tone
reviews.reviewText: I have been using for the past 2 months pretty consistently this cream and I’m speechless how firm smooth and even skin I have !!! I’m in love with the results and I highly recommend this cream I’m about to purchase 3 more bottles as I don’t want to ever run out this cream .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent moisturizer for all skin types.
reviews.reviewText: Does not sit on top of your skin. Soaks in when applied lightly. Can’t be beat for the price point. Definitely a repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: Cream texture is thick, but applies kinda light. It really covers my dryness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Loved this and buying again for the 2nd time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizes well. My skin looks brighter and healthier after a week. Strong barrier.
reviews.reviewText: At the time of writing this review, I flip flop between 4 and 5 stars. I have been using this for almost a week. Yesterday, when I looked in the mirror, I felt that my skin looked really good. I was trying to figure out why then remembered I have been trying this out for almost a week. I will credit the moisturizer to how my skin looks.What this is:This is an organic kombucha collagen cream. It is vegan. 1.69 ounces that is in a small wide mouth jar. I can easily dip my fingers in.I used it every morning and every other night. It has a nice very light pleasant scent to it. It is a thick cream.My skin absorbed it easily. It never looked greasy. It moisturizes very well.It has only been not even a complete week but do I notice any plumping from the collagen? No. Not in a week. When I was observing my skin yesterday, I felt my skin looked brighter and healthier.What I do notice is that it makes a very strong barrier on my face. If I start to perspire, the sweat doesn't act the same way on my face. This is why I want to give it 4 stars. I feel that my face can't rid itself of the sweat as easily. It almost feels like the sweat just sticks to my face. The cream holding it in place.In the end, I am giving this 4 stars because of the sweat factor. I am an active person who goes to the gym and martial arts classes. I felt the sweat couldn't get out through the moisturizer. I will continue to use it, but only at night before bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cream ever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh Clean Feel, Lightweight Hydration
reviews.reviewText: This is such a lovely and luxurious face cream! Fresh herbaceous scent wafts towards you as you apply this deliciously light but extremely hydrating cream/lotion. It sinks into skin quickly and easily leaving my skin soft with a natural looking satin finish. It wears well under my silicone primer and water based makeup. This is a perfect choice for those with any skin type, including my own, dry/combo, who want all day hydration but no heavy or greasy feel. It is gentle and does not irritate sensitive areas that are prone to redden or flake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like LaMer, but it’s 100% natural!
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the texture of this moisturizer. It reminds me of LaMer’s original formula, but this appears to be a MUCH cleaner formula. The cream is very rich, but absorbs quickly and completely. The scent makes me think of fir trees; I like patchouli, but sadly, I could not detect it here.My skin is left moist without being tacky; for me this is a great daytime cream. It layers nicely over essence and serums without pilling. No breakouts, which I occasionally experience with new products. Over time I think this has made my skin a bit more calm despite being winter in New England, which I think means it has helped repair my moisture barrier.This currently sells for $35.10, which is a steal for this 1.7 ounce jar. I hope it doesn’t triple in price by the time I need to restock 🤞🏻
